commit.message:
[DOCS] Add data streams to API conventions

Updates the existing API conventions docs to make them aware of data
streams.

nodes.bodyText: Just a heads-up, but data stream names don't support date math since a single data stream is supposed to handle a potentially infinite stream of data and the data stream's backing indices are named according to their generation and not the date on which they were created.
